data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Strict Tool Calling
inputParams.name: strictToolCalling
inputParams.description: Whether the model supports the `strict` argument when passing in tools. If not specified, the `strict` argument will not be passed to OpenAI.

inputParams.label: Stop Sequence
inputParams.name: stopSequence
inputParams.description: List of stop words to use when generating. Use comma to separate multiple stop words.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

inputParams.label: Reasoning
inputParams.description: Whether the model supports reasoning. Only applicable for reasoning models.
inputParams.name: reasoning

inputParams.label: Reasoning Effort
inputParams.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models
inputParams.name: reasoningEffort

inputParams.label: Reasoning Summary
inputParams.description: A summary of the reasoning performed by the model. This can be useful for debugging and understanding the model's reasoning process
inputParams.name: reasoningSummary

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Structured Output Parser
data.name: structuredOutputParser
data.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure.

inputParams.label: Autofix
inputParams.name: autofixParser
inputParams.description: In the event that the first call fails, will make another call to the model to fix any errors.

inputParams.label: JSON Structure
inputParams.name: jsonStructure
inputParams.description: JSON structure for LLM to return

default.description: sources used to answer the question, should be websites

inputs.jsonStructure: [{"property":"name","type":"string","description":"The name of the user","id":0},{"property":"phone","type":"number","description":"The phone of the user","actions":"","id":1}]

outputAnchors.name: structuredOutputParser
outputAnchors.label: StructuredOutputParser
outputAnchors.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure.

data.label: LLM Chain
data.name: llmChain
data.description: Chain to run queries against LLMs

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

data.label: IfElse Function
data.name: ifElseFunction
data.description: Split flows based on If Else javascript functions

inputParams.label: Input Variables
inputParams.name: functionInputVariables
inputParams.description: Input variables can be used in the function with prefix $. For example: $var

inputParams.label: If Function
inputParams.name: ifFunction
inputParams.description: Function must return a value

inputParams.label: Else Function
inputParams.name: elseFunction
inputParams.description: Function must return a value

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template: Поблагодари пользователя за то, что он оставил контактные данные и скажи, что в ближайшее время с ним свяжутся менеджеры для уточнения деталей.

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template: Вежливо попроси, чтобы пользователь проверил корректность номера и прислал свое имя и номер телефона в одном сообщении еще раз.

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

data.label: Prompt Template
data.name: promptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM

inputParams.label: Template
inputParams.name: template
inputParams.placeholder: What is a good name for a company that makes {product}?

inputs.template: Извлеки из сообщения пользователя {message} имя и номер телефона для последующего парсинга в JSON. Если имени нет в сообщении поищи его в {chat_history}. Если и там нет, то добавь вместо имени плейсхолдер "Клиент с чата". Если в сообщении нет ничего похожего на номер телефона, то верни просто пустой JSON объект без плейсхолдеров внутри.

outputAnchors.name: promptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: PromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a basic prompt for an LLM
